Name: U
Description/Notes: the horizontal velocity as a complex quantity (dat.u + 1j * dat.v)

Name: U_mag
Description/Notes: the magnitude of the horizontal velocity

Name: U_angle
Description/Notes: the direction of the horizontal velocity (counter-clockwise from East; X; or streamwise direction; depending on coordinate system)

Name: subset
Description/Notes: a tool for indexing a subset of the data object

Name: tke
Description/Notes: the turbulent kinetic energy (half the sum of the data in `'tke_vec'`)

Name: Ecoh
Description/Notes: Coherent turbulent kinetic energy (root-sum-square of Reynold's stresses)

Name: I
Description/Notes: Ratio of sigma_Uh to horizontal velocity magnitude

Name: Itke
Description/Notes: Ratio of sqrt(2*tke) to horizontal velocity magnitude
